title: Pixel 3 XL battery replaced Read post
content: Today I've replaced my battery at the a local shop , to my surprise the battery was a little swollen when the guy showed me bear in mind had this phone for 2 years and 2 months.Battery seems to be holding a little better but to my surprise the draining is still happening (see picture) When Google will admit their mistake and will release a fix? Gone from 100% to 61% in 3 h is not normal
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
